data.title: Iain Dale All Talk
data.meta_description: Join Iain Dale & Penny Mordaunt MP for a candid conversation about politics, current affairs and more at EICC Edinburgh. Book your tickets now.
data.text:
Award-winning LBC presenter returns with a series of indepth interviews featuring his acclaimed, incisive insight on current affairs and audience questions. Today's guest: Penny Mordaunt, the MP for Portsmouth North and Leader of the House of Commons.

'Forensic and mischievous interviewer with a deep sense of humanity beneath the brilliant probing' (Emily Maitlis).

'For many political addicts, he is their warm but watchful friend' (Andrew Marr).

'Makes me feel happier and cleverer every time I hear him' (Jeremy Vine).

'The indefatigable Iain Dale always cuts to the nub of politics' (Adam Boulton).
